aggregation: This index is the normalized average of the scores of both indices of citizen-initiated mechanism of direct democracy popular initiatives and referendums. For an elaboration of the weighting factor of each component, see David Altman 2016. The index is aggregated using this formula: v2xdd_cic = [v2xdd_i_ci + v2xdd_i_rf ]/4
name: v2xdd_cic
